Class Lock

java.lang.Object
Lock
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Lock extends Object implements Serializable
Method used to implement the Locks in the game, their fields, behavior and values
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Lock

      public Lock(String requiredItem, String lockedMessage, String unlockPrompt, boolean consumesItem)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      requiredItem - String(name) of the required item to unlock this lock
      lockedMessage - Message for if the player unlocks the lock
      unlockPrompt - Boolean value indicating whether the lock is unlocked/locked
      consumesItem - Boolean value indicating whether unlocking the lock consumes the item required

  • Method Details

    • showUnlockPrompt

      protected String showUnlockPrompt(Player player, Scanner scanner)
      Method handling interacting with and attempting to unlock the lock, checking if the player owns required item
      Parameters:
      player - Who is attempting to unlock the lock
      scanner - Scanner
      Returns:
      the player's choice, null if player doesn't own the required item

    • attemptUnlock

      public boolean attemptUnlock(Player player, Scanner scanner)
      Method used for attempting to unlock the door, applying changes if successful
      Parameters:
      player - Who's attempting to unlock the lock
      scanner - Scanner
      Returns:
      boolean value true/false, based on whether the lock had been unlocked or not
